def_en: Hay is grass which has been cut and dried so that it can be used to feed animals.

def_cn: 趁太阳好晒草;抓紧有利时机;不失良机
def_en: If you say that someone is making hay or is making hay while the sun shines, you mean that they are taking advantage of a situation that is favourable to them while they have the chance to.
